text: Mother: Did you enjoy your first day at school?-Girl: First day? Do you mean I have to go back tomorrow?
Headmaster: I’ve had complaints about you, Johnny, from all your teachers. What have you been doing? Johnny: Nothing, sir.Headmaster: Exactly!
Patient: Doctor, I think that I’ve been bitten by a vampire.Doctor: Drink this glass of water.Patient: Will it make me better?Doctor: No, but I’ll be able to see if your neck leaks. .
Java and C were telling jokes. It was C's turn, so he writes something on the wall, points to it and says 'Do you get the reference?' But Java didn't.
Why did Adele cross the road? To say “hello from the other side”.
Have a great weekend! I hope your code behaves the same on Monday as it did on Friday.
Can February March? No, but April May.
How do you tell HTML from HTML5? - Try it out in Internet Explorer - Did it work? - No? - It's html5.
